creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: snow-covered trees on large boulders lining small inlet at bottom; a few small buildings lower center visible behind trees and inlet; in background, mountain tops rise through clouds; inscription URQ
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals:

URQ: [ 乱雲低満暮急雪舞 / 回風乙亥之春造杜少陵詩意於水石堂 ] (Agitated clouds descend at dusk, / Sudden snow dances in the whirlwind. - Spring 1875, from Tu Fu\'s poetic idea, at Suisekido.) (SA)
markings: URC, square intaglio: [ __ __ no in]; URQ, square relief; LRC, square intaglio
signed: URC following inscription: [ 多田老＿清賞/老山安養 [?] ]
title: Sudden Snow Dances in the Whirlwind
